description: ff. 188. 248 x 155; 183 x 98 mm. 23 lin. 17th cen. Brockelmann, GAL, S I, 725 (commentary 11a) - the commentator completed his work in Jumādá II, 762. Incip.: ... الحمد لله الجلى شأنه الباهر برهانه

subject: Shāṭibī, al-Qāsim ibn Fīrruh, 1144-1194—ḥirz al-amānī wa-wajh al-tahānī.
